pkgmetadata.longdescription: # fasjson-clientA python client library for the FASJSON APIThis client uses the bravado library to build dynamic api methods based on open-api specs (version 2.0): https://github.com/Yelp/bravadoThe documentation is available at https://fasjson-client.readthedocs.io/## LicenseLicensed under [lgpl-3.0](./LICENSE)
